\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{\coprod _{I_i}M} && {\coprod _{I_i} \coprod _{J_i}M} \\
	{\coprod _{I}M} && {\coprod _{I} \coprod _{J_i}M} \\
	&& {\prod _{I} \coprod _{J_i}M} & {\coprod _{J_i}M} \\
	&& {\prod _{I} \coprod _{J}M} & {\coprod _{J}M} \\
	{\text{variables}} && {\text{equations}} & {\text{sums}}
	\arrow["{\cdot \mathbf R_i}", from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\varinjlim _i(\cdot \mathbf R_i)}", from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow[curve={height=12pt}, from=2-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow[curve={height=24pt}, from=2-1, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{\coprod _{J_i}\sigma}"', from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\coprod_{J_0}\Sigma}", curve={height=-12pt}, two heads, from=2-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{\coprod_{J_i}\widetilde {\Sigma}}", two heads, from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow[hook, from=3-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow[hook, from=3-4, to=4-4]
	\arrow["{\coprod_{J}\widetilde {\Sigma}}", two heads, from=4-3, to=4-4]
	\arrow[from=5-1, to=5-3]
	\arrow[two heads, from=5-3, to=5-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
